short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Changes mentions of skits to crazy mix-em-ups

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: As suggested by Jillian Sederholm of Entertainment Weekly magazine, this extension changes mentions of "skits" - often used to erroneously refer to comedy sketches - to "crazy mix-em-ups," as Christopher Walken called them on one of his SNL appearances.
